main event: On August 2, 1956, multiple witnesses reported observing unidentifiable flying objects near Amarillo, Texas.
interesting points: The objects were described as stationary cloud formations that appeared to be moving,The sighting lasted for 2 hours and 15 minutes,There were two objects observed at different times,One witness was a former bomber pilot who commented on the extraordinary nature of the phenomenon,No photographs were conclusively verified as authentic representations of the objects.
witness description: including a former World War II bomber pilot and civilian witnesses
